abstract: California regulators order San Francisco to stop taking some river water, which it routinely stores in Hetch Hetchy reservoir, during drought.
lead_paragraph: California state regulators on Friday told San Francisco to stop taking some of the river water it routinely stores in the Hetch Hetchy reservoir.

headline.main: California: Water Controls Ordered for San Francisco
headline.print_headline: California: Water Controls Ordered for San Francisco

snippet: California state regulators on Friday told San Francisco to stop taking some of the river water it routinely stores in the Hetch Hetchy reservoir.
